text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = SOCCSKSARGEN | other_name = Region XII Central Mindanao (formerly) | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_size = 120x80px | image_seal = | seal_size = 100x80px | image_map = | map_caption = Location in the Philippines | nickname = | motto = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Philippines | subdivision_type1 = Island group | subdivision_name1 = Mindanao | seat_type = Regional center | seat = Koronadal | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_total_km2 = 22,513.30 | area_footnotes = | population_as_of = 2015 | population_total = 4,545,276 | population_footnotes = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone = PST | utc_offset = +8 | iso_code = PH-12 | blank_name_sec1 = Provinces | blank_info_sec1 = | blank1_name_sec1 = Cities | blank1_info_sec1 = | blank2_name_sec1 = Municipalities | blank2_info_sec1 = 45 | blank3_name_sec1 = Barangays | blank3_info_sec1 = 1,195 | website = | name = }} Soccsksargen (sometimes stylised as SOCCSKSARGEN) is an administrative region of the Philippines. It is also known as Region XII. The regional center is Koronadal. There are four provinces and 1 city. They are South Cotabato, Cotabato, Sultan Kudarat, Sarangani and General Santos. Mindanao River is in the region. It empties into the Illana Bay of the larger Moro Gulf. ==References==
title: Soccsksargen
